paragraph_1: Dandela Crypto Converter collects information about exchange rates between cryptocurrencies and currencies. We use this information to provide currency conversion services to our users.
paragraph_2: Our website also collects information about our user's display preferences (day/night) and language. This information is stored in the user's personal storage settings and can be manually deleted at any time via the browser.
paragraph_3: We don't share this information with third parties unless required by law or for security reasons. We take steps to protect your information from loss, misuse, and alteration.
paragraph_4: If you have any questions or concerns regarding our privacy policy, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are committed to respecting your privacy and protecting your information.
